name: Pixazza
author: Fabrizio Pivari

sections.description:
This plugin adds the required javascript for Pixazza (Luminate) webapp and allows to set the parameters with a simply interface.

Using this plugin you can change your theme or upgrade it without set everytime Pixazza code (javascript).

For more information about Pixazza (Luminate) visit: www.luminate.com

If you haven’t ever seen Pixazza you can see it in over the biggest images at Art & Artworks.

Donate to Fabrizio Pivari
sections.installation:
1. Upload pixazza directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Customize the plugin in the settings page (Admin > Settings > Pixazza). You have to add your site Pixazza ID
sections.faq:
I’ve installed the plugin and activate it but it doesn’t seem to work

Remember you have to create an account for Pixazza www.luminate.com, add your site and manage/configure it then the plugin will work
